name: Shortcuts
description: Perform common tasks with your keyboard.

01.goBack.description: Navigation · Go back to the previous page in tab’s history

02.goForward.description: Navigation · Go forward to the next page in tab’s history

04.reloadTabWithoutCache.description: Navigation · Reload selected tabs, ignoring cached content

05.goToNextPage.description: Navigation · Go to the next page in the series

06.goToPreviousPage.description: Navigation · Go to the previous page in the series

08.goUp.description: Navigation · Go up in the URL hierarchy

09.goToRoot.description: Navigation · Go to the root URL

11.focusTextArea.description: Accessibility · Focus the first text area

13.copyURL.description: Clipboard · Copy URL of selected tabs

14.copyTitle.description: Clipboard · Copy title of selected tabs

15.copyTitleAndURL.description: Clipboard · Copy title and URL of selected tabs

24.scrollToTop.description: Scroll · Scroll to the top of the page

25.scrollToBottom.description: Scroll · Scroll to the bottom of the page

29.toggleFullScreen.description: Zoom · Turn full-screen mode on or off

30.openNewTab.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab

31.openNewTabRight.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab to the right

32.openNewWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window

33.openNewIncognitoWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window in Incognito mode

35.closeWindow.description: Close tabs · Close the window that contains the tab

36.restoreTab.description: Close tabs · Reopen previously closed tabs

38.togglePinTab.description: Tab state · Pin or unpin selected tabs

39.toggleGroupTab.description: Tab state · Group or ungroup selected tabs

40.toggleCollapseTabGroups.description: Tab state · Collapse or uncollapse tab groups

41.toggleMuteTab.description: Tab state · Mute or unmute selected tabs

43.focusAudibleTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the first audible tab

44.focusNextTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next open tab

45.focusPreviousTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous open tab

46.focusFirstTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the leftmost open tab

47.focusSecondTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the second leftmost open tab

48.focusThirdTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the third leftmost open tab

49.focusFourthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fourth leftmost open tab

50.focusFifthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the fifth leftmost open tab

51.focusSixthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the sixth leftmost open tab

52.focusSeventhTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the seventh leftmost open tab

53.focusEighthTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the eighth leftmost open tab

54.focusLastTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the rightmost open tab

55.focusNextWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next window

56.focusPreviousWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous window

59.moveTabFirst.description: Move tabs · Move tab to the far left

60.moveTabLast.description: Move tabs · Move tab to the far right

61.moveTabNewWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to a new window

62.moveTabPreviousWindow.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the previous window

63.moveTabGroupLeft.description: Move tabs · Move tab group left

64.moveTabGroupRight.description: Move tabs · Move tab group right

65.moveTabGroupFirst.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to the far left

66.moveTabGroupLast.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to the far right

67.moveTabGroupNewWindow.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to a new window

68.moveTabGroupPreviousWindow.description: Move tabs · Move tab group to the previous window

69.selectTab.description: Select tabs · Deselect all other tabs

70.selectTabsInGroup.description: Select tabs · Select tabs in group

72.selectRightTabs.description: Select tabs · Select tabs to the right

74.openHistoryPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the History page

75.openDownloadsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Downloads page

76.openBookmarksPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Bookmarks page

77.openSettingsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Settings page

78.openPasswordsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Passwords page

79.openSearchEnginesPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Search engines page

80.openExtensionsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Extensions page

81.openShortcutsPage.description: Chrome URLs · Open the Extensions > Keyboard shortcuts page
